snippet.title: The Storyteller - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The Storyteller is an online game that takes traditional TTRPG elements into a digital environment. You can build your own world, play online with your friends, engage in role-playing, and guide them through your story.

Play for free now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2858270 
Join the community: https://discord.gg/zvm5TaYSBX 
Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61555221599019 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TheStorytellerO 
Visit our website for more information: https://thestoryteller.games
